channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: House set to vote on funding package to end government shutdown
item.description: The House is set to vote on funding major parts of the government to end the partial shutdown. Follow live updates here.

item.title: Disney names Josh D'Amaro CEO, Dana Walden president and chief creative officer
item.description: The company's next CEO will succeed current chief executive Bob Iger.

item.title: WATCH: Houses washed away in North Carolina's Outer Banks
item.description: Waterfront houses collapsed into the ocean as a powerful winter storm lashed North Carolina's Outer Banks.

item.title: Blood found inside home of Savannah Guthrie's mother, source says
item.description: Investigators are combing through the house of "Today" show co-host Savannah Guthrie's mother, Nancy, in search of clues to the 84-year-old's disappea...

item.title: What is the price of silver today: February 3, 2026?
item.description: The price of silver has noticeably changed in recent days. Here's where it sits as of February 3, 2026.

item.title: Elon Musk's SpaceX acquires xAI to form company worth $1.25 trillion
item.description: SpaceX acquired xAI to create a company valued at $1.25 trillion, SpaceX announced. Al Root, an associate editor at Barron's, joins with more.

item.title: WATCH: Floridians picking up cold-stunned iguanas amid wintry weather
item.description: Authorities have given people a special dispensation to bring specimens of the invasive species to collection points.

item.title: House to hold votes on funding package to end partial government shutdown
item.description: The House will hold votes on Tuesday to try to reopen the government after it partially shut down over the weekend.

item.title: WATCH: Behind the scenes before Westminster's best in show
item.description: ABC News' Danny New tours the 150th Westminster Kennel Club Dog Show, meeting people from around the U.S. and exotic dog breeds that are new to him.

item.title: Whistleblower's lawyer says Tulsi Gabbard has stalled review of complaint for months
item.description: Andrew Bakaj, the chief legal counsel for Whistlbloweraid.org and a lawyer for the whistleblower accusing Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabb...

item.title: Judge blocks Trump administration from ending protections for Haitians
Authorities believe ‘Today’ show host Savannah Guthrie’s mother was taken against her will
Trump’s $45 billion expansion of immigrant detention sites faces pushback from communities
item.description: State and local officials are pushing back against federal plans to expand immigrant detention facilities.
